U2E2ShFqidehrX3I.hint: Humans vary widely in height and weight, but most adults range between 5 feet and 6 feet tall, and they average around 150 pounds. If you play a human of average height, your size is Medium. If you choose to play a human shorter than 4 feet, you can choose your size to be Small.

description.value:
Your human character has certain hereditary traits dictated by their lineage.

Age. Humans reach adulthood in their late teenage years and rarely live to be more than 100 years old.

@Embed[.Advancement.U2E2ShFqidehrX3I inline]{Size}

Speed. Your base walking speed is 30 feet.

@Embed[Compendium.black-flag.lineages.Item.nnTLBZROcTelysG5 inline]{Ambitious}
description.short: By most accounts, humans are the youngest people of the world, but their tenacity and adaptability has allowed them to quickly spread.
